sql.query: select ap.perapp_title, ap.perapp_fname, ap.perapp_istatus,ap.PERAPP_SEX, ap.perapp_cbsid, ap.PERAPP_RELIGION, solid, perapp_constitution, to_char(ap.perapp_dob,'dd-mm-yyyy') as perapp_dob, ap.perapp_panno, ap.perapp_marstat, con_comaddr1 as ADDRESS1, con_comaddr2||','||con_comvillage as address2, con_comcity, con_comstate , con_comcountry, con_comzip, indinfo_physically_challanged||indinfo_exservice_man as handiservice, indinfo_caste from perapplicant ap, per_demographics, cust_contactinfo, individual_info, organisations where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='a' and demo_appid=perapp_id and indinfo_appid=con_appid and con_appid=demo_appid and perapp_branchcode=org_scode
select peremp_occupation, peremp_empno from peremployer, per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='a' and demo_appid=peremp_id

select tax_slab, operation_mode, sector_code, purpose_advance, subsector, sanction_level, sanction_authority, FreeText7, advmode, advtype, borrowcat, indtype, label,cbs_cust_type,cbs_health_code,cbs_freecode7 from additional_parameternew where param_appnonew='^'

select l.loan_appno, l.LOAN_RECMDAMT, ls.LOAN_PERIODICITY, a.cbs_accountno as cbsaccount, l.LOAN_REQTERMS, l.loan_modeofpay,l.loan_operativeaccno as operativeaccno, ( l.LOAN_REQTERMS-ls.LOAN_NOOFINSTALLMENT ) as instalments, ls.loan_secure, l.LOAN_MODINTRATE, to_char(a.app_processdate+365,'dd-mm-yyyy') as limitexpirydate, to_char(a.app_processdate,'dd-mm-yyyy') as processdate, to_char(sysdate,'dd-mm-yyyy') as loan_startdate, scheme_code, a.app_loantype from loandetails l,per_loan_secure ls ,applications a, products where l.loan_appno='^' and ls.loan_appno=l.loan_appno and l.loan_appno=a.app_no and app_prdcode=prd_code

select cbs_companycode, comapp_id, comapp_companyname, to_char(comapp_yrsinbusiness,'DD-MM-YYYY')as comapp_yrsinbusiness, comapp_regadd1, comapp_regadd2, comapp_regstate, comapp_regpin, comapp_regcountry, comapp_ownership, company_status, company_staff, company_inland,company_introtitle, company_introname from comapplicant where comapp_id=(select demo_comappid from com_demographics where demo_appno='^')
select minor, guardian, relation_address, trade_finance, trade_inland, intr_title, intr_name from additional_cbsparameter where comtype='R' and CUSTID='^'
update facilities set CBS_ACCOUNTNO=? where FACILITY_APPNO=? and FACILITY_SNO=?
update comapplicant set cbs_companycode=? where comapp_id=?
select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^'
update perapplicant set perapp_cbsid=? where perapp_id=?
select demo_comappid, app_loantype from com_demographics, applications where demo_appno='^' and applications.app_no= com_demographics.demo_appno

select inward_no, inward_orgscode, inward_custname, inward_purpose, case when inward_sector ='p' then 'retail' when inward_sector = 'a' then 'agriculture' when inward_sector ='t' then 'tertiary' when inward_sector= 'c' then 'corporate/sme' else '' end as inward_sector, to_char(inward_createdon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as createdon, org_name, org_phone, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state from appinwardreg, laps_cities, organisations, laps_states where org_city=city_code(+) and state_code(+)=org_state and inward_orgscode=org_scode and upper(inward_docreceived)='n' and to_date(to_char(inward_modifieddate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy')

select inward_no, inward_orgscode, inward_custname, inward_purpose, case when inward_sector ='p' then 'retail' when inward_sector = 'a' then 'agriculture' when inward_sector ='t' then 'tertiary' when inward_sector= 'c' then 'corporate/sme' else '' end as inward_sector, to_char(inward_createdon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as createdon, org_name, org_phone, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state from appinwardreg, laps_cities, organisations, laps_states where org_city=city_code(+) and state_code(+)=org_state and inward_orgscode=org_scode and upper(inward_docreceived)='n' and (to_char(inward_modifieddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(to_date( '^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))

select INWARD_NO, org.org_name, INWARD_CUSTNAME, INWARD_PURPOSE, case when INWARD_SECTOR ='p' then 'RETAIL' when INWARD_SECTOR = 'a' then 'AGRICULTURE' when INWARD_SECTOR ='t' then 'TERTIARY' when INWARD_SECTOR= 'c' then 'CORPORATE/SME' else '' End as INWARD_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(INWARD_CREATEDON,'DD/MM/YYYY') as CREATEDON, INWARD_TERMLOANAMT, INWARD_WCLOANAMT, INWARD_NONWCLOANAMT, to_char(MAIL_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as pendingdate, MAIL_TOUSRID, USR_FNAME, usrorg.ORG_NAME pendingorg, org.org_phone as org_phone, org.org_add1 as org_add1, org.org_add2 as org_add2, org.org_city as org_city, org.org_state as org_state, city_name, state_name from appmailbox a ,applications, appinwardreg, users, laps_cities, organisations org, organisations usrorg, laps_states where org.org_city=city_code(+) and state_code(+)=org.org_state and inward_orgscode=org.org_scode and usr_orgcode=usrorg.org_code and usr_id = mail_tousrid and TO_DATE(to_char(app_createdate,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and lower(app_status)='op' and app_delflag='N' and inward_no=app_inwardno and mail_appno=app_no and mail_type='C' AND mail_date =(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where a.mail_appno = b.mail_appno)

select INWARD_NO, org.org_name, INWARD_CUSTNAME, INWARD_PURPOSE, case when INWARD_SECTOR ='p' then 'RETAIL' when INWARD_SECTOR = 'a' then 'AGRICULTURE' when INWARD_SECTOR ='t' then 'TERTIARY' when INWARD_SECTOR= 'c' then 'CORPORATE/SME' else '' End as INWARD_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(INWARD_CREATEDON,'DD/MM/YYYY') as CREATEDON, to_char(MAIL_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as pendingdate, MAIL_TOUSRID, USR_FNAME, usrorg.ORG_NAME pendingorg, org.org_phone as org_phone, org.org_add1 as org_add1, org.org_add2 as org_add2, org.org_city as org_city, org.org_state as org_state, city_name, state_name from appmailbox a ,applications, appinwardreg, users, laps_cities, organisations org, organisations usrorg, laps_states where org.org_city=city_code(+) and state_code(+)=org.org_state and inward_orgscode=org.org_scode and usr_orgcode=usrorg.org_code and usr_id = mail_tousrid and (to_char(app_createdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(to_date( '^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) and lower(app_status)='op' and app_delflag='N' and inward_no=app_inwardno and mail_appno=app_no and mail_type='C' AND mail_date =(select max(mail_date) from appmailbox b where a.mail_appno = b.mail_appno)

select inward_no, org.org_name receivedorg, inward_custname, inward_purpose, case when inward_sector ='p' then 'retail' when inward_sector = 'a' then 'agriculture' when inward_sector ='t' then 'tertiary' when inward_sector= 'c' then 'corporate/sme' else '' end as inward_sector, to_char(inward_createdon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as createdon, to_char(app_createdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as pendingdate, app_applnholder, usr_fname, usrorg.org_name pendingorg, org.org_phone as org_phone, org.org_add1 as org_add1, org.org_add2 as org_add2, org.org_city as org_city, org.org_state as org_state, city_name, state_name from applications app, appinwardreg reg, laps_cities, organisations org , users, organisations usrorg, laps_states where org.org_city=city_code(+) and state_code(+)=org.org_state and usrorg.org_code=usr_orgcode and usr_id=app.app_applnholder and app.app_applnholder is not null and org.org_scode=reg.inward_orgscode and reg.inward_no=app.app_inwardno and app.app_inwardno is not null and to_date(to_char(app_createdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and app.mailchkstatus is null and app.app_status='op' and app.app_delflag='N' and reg.inward_appatached='Y'

select inward_no, org.org_name receivedorg, inward_custname, inward_purpose, case when inward_sector ='p' then 'retail' when inward_sector = 'a' then 'agriculture' when inward_sector ='t' then 'tertiary' when inward_sector= 'c' then 'corporate/sme' else '' end as inward_sector, to_char(inward_createdon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as createdon, to_char(app_createdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as pendingdate, app_applnholder, usr_fname, usrorg.org_name pendingorg, org.org_phone as org_phone, org.org_add1 as org_add1, org.org_add2 as org_add2, org.org_city as org_city, org.org_state as org_state, city_name, state_name from applications app, appinwardreg reg, laps_cities, organisations org , users, organisations usrorg, laps_states where org.org_city=city_code(+) and state_code(+)=org.org_state and usrorg.org_code=usr_orgcode and usr_id=app.app_applnholder and app.app_applnholder is not null and org.org_scode=reg.inward_orgscode and reg.inward_no=app.app_inwardno and app.app_inwardno is not null and (to_char(app_createdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(to_date( '^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) and app.mailchkstatus is null and app.app_status='op' and app.app_delflag='N' and reg.inward_appatached='Y'

select INWARD_NO, INWARD_ORGSCODE, INWARD_CUSTNAME, INWARD_PURPOSE, case when INWARD_SECTOR ='p' then 'RETAIL' when INWARD_SECTOR = 'a' then 'AGRICULTURE' when INWARD_SECTOR ='t' then 'TERTIARY' when INWARD_SECTOR= 'c' then 'CORPORATE/SME' else '' End as INWARD_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(INWARD_CREATEDON,'DD/MM/YYYY') as CREATEDON, org_name, org_phone, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state, city_name, state_name from appinwardreg, applications, laps_cities, organisations org, laps_states where org.org_city=city_code(+) and state_code(+)=org.org_state and inward_orgscode=org_scode and TO_DATE(to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and lower(app_status)='pa' and app_delflag='N' and app_inwardno = INWARD_NO

select INWARD_NO, INWARD_ORGSCODE, INWARD_CUSTNAME, INWARD_PURPOSE, case when INWARD_SECTOR ='p' then 'RETAIL' when INWARD_SECTOR = 'a' then 'AGRICULTURE' when INWARD_SECTOR ='t' then 'TERTIARY' when INWARD_SECTOR= 'c' then 'CORPORATE/SME' else '' End as INWARD_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(INWARD_CREATEDON,'DD/MM/YYYY') as CREATEDON, org_name, org_phone, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state, city_name, state_name from appinwardreg,applications, organisations, laps_states, laps_cities where org_city=city_code(+) and state_code(+)=org_state and inward_orgscode=org_scode and (to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(to_date( '^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) and lower(app_status)='pa' and app_delflag='N' and app_inwardno = INWARD_NO

select INWARD_NO, INWARD_ORGSCODE, INWARD_CUSTNAME, INWARD_PURPOSE, case when INWARD_SECTOR ='p' then 'RETAIL' when INWARD_SECTOR = 'a' then 'AGRICULTURE' when INWARD_SECTOR ='t' then 'TERTIARY' when INWARD_SECTOR= 'c' then 'CORPORATE/SME' else '' End as INWARD_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(INWARD_CREATEDON,'DD/MM/YYYY') as CREATEDON, org_name, org_phone, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state, city_name, state_name from appinwardreg,applications, organisations, laps_cities, laps_states where org_state=state_code(+) and org_city=city_code(+) and inward_orgscode=org_scode and TO_DATE(to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and lower(app_status)='pr' and app_delflag='N' and app_inwardno = INWARD_NO

select INWARD_NO, INWARD_ORGSCODE, INWARD_CUSTNAME, INWARD_PURPOSE, case when INWARD_SECTOR ='p' then 'RETAIL' when INWARD_SECTOR = 'a' then 'AGRICULTURE' when INWARD_SECTOR ='t' then 'TERTIARY' when INWARD_SECTOR= 'c' then 'CORPORATE/SME' else '' End as INWARD_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(INWARD_CREATEDON,'DD/MM/YYYY') as CREATEDON, org_name, org_phone, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state, city_name, state_name from appinwardreg, applications, organisations, laps_cities, laps_states where org_state=state_code(+) and org_city=city_code(+) and inward_orgscode=org_scode and (to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(to_date( '^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) and lower(app_status)='pr' and app_delflag='N' and app_inwardno = INWARD_NO

select INWARD_NO, INWARD_ORGSCODE, INWARD_CUSTNAME, INWARD_PURPOSE, case when INWARD_SECTOR ='p' then 'RETAIL' when INWARD_SECTOR = 'a' then 'AGRICULTURE' when INWARD_SECTOR ='t' then 'TERTIARY' when INWARD_SECTOR= 'c' then 'CORPORATE/SME' else '' End as INWARD_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(INWARD_CREATEDON,'DD/MM/YYYY') as CREATEDON, org_name, org_phone, usr_fname, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state from appinwardreg, organisations, users where usr_id=org_head and upper(INWARD_DOCRECEIVED)='Y' and inward_appatached='N' and appinwardreg.inward_applnprocessat='1' and org_scode = inward_orgscode and TO_DATE(to_char(INWARD_MODIFIEDDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY')

select INWARD_NO, INWARD_ORGSCODE, INWARD_CUSTNAME, INWARD_PURPOSE, case when INWARD_SECTOR ='p' then 'RETAIL' when INWARD_SECTOR = 'a' then 'AGRICULTURE' when INWARD_SECTOR ='t' then 'TERTIARY' when INWARD_SECTOR= 'c' then 'CORPORATE/SME' else '' End as INWARD_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(INWARD_CREATEDON,'DD/MM/YYYY') as CREATEDON, org_name, org_phone, usr_fname, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state from appinwardreg, organisations, users where usr_id=org_head and upper(INWARD_DOCRECEIVED)='Y' and inward_appatached='N' and appinwardreg.inward_applnprocessat='1' and org_scode = inward_orgscode and (to_char(INWARD_MODIFIEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))

select INWARD_NO, INWARD_ORGSCODE, INWARD_CUSTNAME, INWARD_PURPOSE, case when INWARD_SECTOR ='p' then 'RETAIL' when INWARD_SECTOR = 'a' then 'AGRICULTURE' when INWARD_SECTOR ='t' then 'TERTIARY' when INWARD_SECTOR= 'c' then 'CORPORATE/SME' else '' End as INWARD_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(INWARD_CREATEDON,'DD/MM/YYYY') as CREATEDON, org_name, org_phone, usr_fname, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state from appinwardreg, organisations, users where usr_id=org_head and upper(INWARD_DOCRECEIVED)='Y' and inward_appatached='N' and appinwardreg.inward_applnprocessat='2' and inward_brstatus='O' and org_scode = inward_orgscode and TO_DATE(to_char(INWARD_MODIFIEDDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY')

select INWARD_NO, INWARD_ORGSCODE, INWARD_CUSTNAME, INWARD_PURPOSE, case when INWARD_SECTOR ='p' then 'RETAIL' when INWARD_SECTOR = 'a' then 'AGRICULTURE' when INWARD_SECTOR ='t' then 'TERTIARY' when INWARD_SECTOR= 'c' then 'CORPORATE/SME' else '' End as INWARD_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(INWARD_CREATEDON,'DD/MM/YYYY') as CREATEDON, org_name, org_phone, usr_fname, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state from appinwardreg, organisations, users where usr_id=org_head and upper(INWARD_DOCRECEIVED)='Y' and inward_appatached='N' and appinwardreg.inward_applnprocessat='2' and inward_brstatus='O' and org_scode=inward_orgscode and (to_char(INWARD_MODIFIEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))

select INWARD_NO, INWARD_ORGSCODE, INWARD_CUSTNAME, INWARD_PURPOSE, case when INWARD_SECTOR ='p' then 'RETAIL' when INWARD_SECTOR = 'a' then 'AGRICULTURE' when INWARD_SECTOR ='t' then 'TERTIARY' when INWARD_SECTOR= 'c' then 'CORPORATE/SME' else '' End as INWARD_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(INWARD_CREATEDON,'DD/MM/YYYY') as CREATEDON, org_name, org_phone, usr_fname, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state, city_name, state_name from appinwardreg, organisations, users, laps_states, laps_cities where org_state=state_code(+) and org_city=city_code(+) and usr_id=inward_assignusrid and inward_assignusrid is not null and upper(INWARD_DOCRECEIVED)='Y' and inward_appatached='N' and appinwardreg.inward_applnprocessat='2' and inward_brstatus='P' and org_scode = inward_orgscode and TO_DATE(to_char(INWARD_MODIFIEDDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY')

select INWARD_NO, INWARD_ORGSCODE, INWARD_CUSTNAME, INWARD_PURPOSE, case when INWARD_SECTOR ='p' then 'RETAIL' when INWARD_SECTOR = 'a' then 'AGRICULTURE' when INWARD_SECTOR ='t' then 'TERTIARY' when INWARD_SECTOR= 'c' then 'CORPORATE/SME' else '' End as INWARD_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(INWARD_CREATEDON,'DD/MM/YYYY') as CREATEDON, org_name, org_phone, usr_fname, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_state, city_name, state_name from appinwardreg, organisations, users, laps_states, laps_cities where org_state=state_code(+) and org_city=city_code(+) and usr_id=inward_assignusrid and inward_assignusrid is not null and upper(INWARD_DOCRECEIVED)='Y' and inward_appatached='N' and appinwardreg.inward_applnprocessat='2' and inward_brstatus='P' and org_scode = inward_orgscode and (to_char(INWARD_MODIFIEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')=to_char(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))
select distinct solid,org_name from organisations where rtrim(solid)!='0' and

select dcb_solid, dcb_accno, dcb_sector, dcb_scheme, (dcb_int_areardemand+ dcb_prin_arreardemand) as dcb_demand_arrear, (dcb_int_currentdemand+dcb_prin_currentdemand) as dcb_demand_current, (dcb_int_collection+dcb_prin_collection) as dcb_collection, (dcb_int_overdueupto12+dcb_prin_overdueupto12) as dcb_less_one_year, (dcb_int_overduemore36+dcb_prin_overduemore36) as dcb_over_three_year, (dcb_int_overduetotal+dcb_prin_overduetotal) as dcb_overduetotal from dcb where dcb_solid='^' order by dcb_sector, dcb_scheme
update dcb set dcb_remark=? where dcb_accno=?
select distinct to_char(target_from,'dd/mm/yyyy') as target_from,to_char(target_to,'dd/mm/yyyy') as target_to from TARGETBranchList where target_branch='^' order by TO_DATE(target_to,'dd/mm/yyyy')
delete from TARGETBranchList where target_from=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') and target_to=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') and target_branch=?
insert into TARGETBranchList (TARGET_BRANCH,TARGET_FROM,TARGET_TO) values(?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))

select a.solid, b.app_no, to_char(b.app_processdate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate, b.app_status, c.perapp_fname, c.perapp_constitution, c.perapp_religion, c.per_caste, c.perapp_selphysical, d.loan_costloanprd, d.loan_amtreqd, d.loan_recmdamt, f.sector_code, f.subsector, f.purpose_advance, h.prd_code, i.peremp_occupation, to_char(pre_visitdate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as pre_visitdate, l.perinc_takehome, to_char(j.inward_appliedon, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_appliedon from organisations a, applications b, perapplicant c, loandetails d, additional_parameternew f, per_demographics g, products h, peremployer i, appinwardreg j, presanctionvisitreport k, perincexpenses l where b.app_orgcode=a.org_code and g.demo_appno=b.app_no and g.demo_type='a' and d.loan_appno=b.app_no and c.perapp_id=g.demo_appid and b.app_no=f.param_appnonew and b.app_prdcode=h.prd_code and c.perapp_id=i.peremp_id and k.pre_strappno(+)=b.app_no and l.perinc_id=c.perapp_id and b.app_inwardno=j.inward_no(+) and b.app_status !='op' and upper(b.app_loantype)='P' and b.app_delflag='N' and to_char(app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') between '^' and '^' order by b.app_no

select a.solid, b.app_no, to_char(b.app_processdate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate, b.app_status, c.perapp_fname, c.perapp_constitution, c.perapp_religion, c.per_caste, c.perapp_selphysical, d.loan_costloanprd, d.loan_amtreqd, d.loan_recmdamt, f.sector_code, f.subsector, f.purpose_advance, h.prd_code, i.peremp_occupation, l.perinc_takehome, to_char(j.inspection_date, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as inspection_date, to_char(m.inward_appliedon, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_appliedon from organisations a, applications b, perapplicant c, loandetails d, additional_parameternew f, per_demographics g, products h, peremployer i, pre_sanction_report j, perincexpenses l, appinwardreg m where b.app_orgcode=a.org_code and g.demo_appno=b.app_no and g.demo_type='a' and d.loan_appno=b.app_no and c.perapp_id=g.demo_appid and b.app_no=f.param_appnonew and b.app_prdcode=h.prd_code and c.perapp_id=i.peremp_id and l.perinc_id=c.perapp_id and j.appno(+)=b.app_no and b.app_inwardno=m.inward_no(+) and b.app_status !='op' and upper(b.app_loantype)='A' and b.app_delflag='N' and to_char(app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') between '^' and '^' order by b.app_no

select a.solid, b.app_no, to_char(b.app_processdate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate, b.app_status, c.perapp_fname, c.perapp_constitution, c.perapp_religion, c.per_caste, c.perapp_selphysical, d.facility_proposed, f.cbs_sector_code, f.cbs_subsector_code, f.cbs_purposeof_advance, f.sanctioned_amt, h.prd_code, i.peremp_occupation, to_char(j.ins_dateofvisit, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as ins_dateofvisit, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=d.facility_headid and facility_parent=0) as facheaddesc, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=d.facility_id and facility_parent!=0) as facdesc, d.facility_headid, d.facility_id, to_char(l.inward_appliedon, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_appliedon from organisations a, applications b, perapplicant c, facilities d, sanction_details f, com_demographics g, products h, peremployer i, ops_inspectionreport j, facility_master k, appinwardreg l where b.app_orgcode=a.org_code and g.demo_appno=b.app_no and demo_apptype='N' and d.facility_appno=b.app_no and c.perapp_id=g.demo_comappid and b.app_prdcode=h.prd_code and c.perapp_id=i.peremp_id and j.ins_appno(+)=d.facility_appno and f.appno=b.app_no and d.facility_headid =k.facility_catid and b.app_inwardno=l.inward_no(+) and b.app_status != 'op' and upper(b.app_loantype)='T' and b.app_delflag='N' and to_char(app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') between '^' and '^' order by b.app_no

select appno,suit_decreed, suit_sectoralcat, suit_amount, suit_courtname, suit_no, to_char(suit_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as suit_date, siut_running, siut_outstanding, siut_securityvalueadvance, siut_presentmarketvalue, to_char(suit_dateofvaluation,'dd/mm/yyyy') as suit_dateofvaluation,suit_recoveryhalf, suit_totalrecovery, to_char(suit_dateofdecree,'dd/mm/yyyy') as suit_dateofdecree, to_char(suit_dateoffilling,'dd/mm/yyyy') as suit_dateoffilling, suit_advocatename, suit_address, suit_phoneno, suit_presentposition, suit_olappointed, suit_saleofstatus, suit_facility, suit_legalproceeding, suit_counterclaim, suit_workercompensation, suit_Statliabilities, suit_Contiliabilities, suit_Others, suit_pendingcriminal, suit_attachment, suit_noreason, suit_process,suit_decreeamount from npa_statusSuitfield where to_date(to_char(suit_modified_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') ORDER BY suit_modified_date

select appno,suit_decreed, suit_sectoralcat, suit_amount, suit_courtname, suit_no, to_char(suit_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as suit_date, siut_running, siut_outstanding, siut_securityvalueadvance, siut_presentmarketvalue, to_char(suit_dateofvaluation,'dd/mm/yyyy') as suit_dateofvaluation,suit_recoveryhalf, suit_totalrecovery, to_char(suit_dateofdecree,'dd/mm/yyyy') as suit_dateofdecree, to_char(suit_dateoffilling,'dd/mm/yyyy') as suit_dateoffilling, suit_advocatename, suit_address, suit_phoneno, suit_presentposition, suit_olappointed, suit_saleofstatus, suit_facility, suit_legalproceeding, suit_counterclaim, suit_workercompensation, suit_Statliabilities, suit_Contiliabilities, suit_Others, suit_pendingcriminal, suit_attachment, suit_noreason, suit_process,suit_decreeamount from npa_statusSuitfield where(to_char(suit_modified_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(to_date( '^', 'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))
select cbsnpa_custid,cbsnpa_custbranch from cbs_npabasic where cbsnpa_custid= (select npa_democbsid from NPA_DEMOGRAPHICS where npa_demoappno='^')

select SOLID,PERAPP_CBSID,App_no,APP_PROCESSDATE,app_loantype,perapp_brdet,perapp_relativedet from applications , perapplicant , per_demographics,ORGANISATIONS where app_no = demo_appno AND demo_appid = perapp_id and App_orgcode = org_code and cbs_accountno is not null and perapp_brdet is not null and upper(app_loantype) in('P','A') AND demo_type='a' and (to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) order by app_loantype desc

select SOLID,PERAPP_CBSID,App_no,APP_PROCESSDATE,app_loantype,perapp_brdet,perapp_relativedet from applications , perapplicant ,com_demographics,ORGANISATIONS where app_no = DEMO_APPNO AND DEMO_COMAPPID = perapp_id and App_orgcode = org_code and cbs_accountno is not null and perapp_brdet is not null and upper(app_loantype)='T' AND DEMO_APPTYPE='N' and to_date(to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') order by APP_PROCESSDATE

select SOLID,PERAPP_CBSID,App_no,APP_PROCESSDATE,app_loantype,perapp_brdet,perapp_relativedet from applications , perapplicant ,com_demographics,ORGANISATIONS where app_no = DEMO_APPNO AND DEMO_COMAPPID = perapp_id and App_orgcode = org_code and cbs_accountno is not null and perapp_brdet is not null and upper(app_loantype)='T' AND DEMO_APPTYPE='N' and (to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))

select SOLID, app.cbs_companycode, App_no, APP_PROCESSDATE, app_loantype, rel.COMAPP_EMPRELNO, rel.COMAPP_PLACEPOST, rel.COMAPP_BORREL from applications , comapp_relationship rel,com_demographics,ORGANISATIONS,COMAPPLICANT app where app_no = DEMO_APPNO AND DEMO_COMAPPID = rel.COMAPP_ID and DEMO_COMAPPID = app.COMAPP_ID and App_orgcode = org_code and cbs_accountno is not null and COMAPP_EMPRELNO is not null and upper(app_loantype)='C' AND DEMO_APPTYPE='N' and (to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') = to_char(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) order by APP_PROCESSDATE

insert into perapplicant( perapp_id,perapp_oldid,perapp_cbsid,perapp_profilestatus,perapp_cbsstatus,perapp_title, perapp_fname,perapp_lname,perapp_dob,perapp_sex,perapp_marstat, perapp_panno,perapp_introname,perapp_tradefinance,perapp_inlandtrade,perapp_constitution, perapp_taxslab,perapp_fatname,perapp_istatus,perapp_introstatus,perapp_branchcode, perapp_constitutionnew,perapp_introtype,perapp_aadhaar) values (?,?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,to_date(?,'dd-mm-yyyy'),?,?, ?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?)

update perapplicant set perapp_title=?,perapp_fname=?,perapp_lname=?,perapp_dob=to_date(?,'dd-mm-yyyy'),perapp_sex=?, perapp_marstat=?,perapp_panno=?,perapp_introname=?,perapp_tradefinance=?,perapp_inlandtrade=?, perapp_constitution=?,perapp_taxslab=?,perapp_fatname=?,perapp_istatus=?,perapp_introstatus=?, perapp_branchcode=?, perapp_constitutionnew=? ,perapp_introtype=?,perapp_aadhaar=? where perapp_id=?

update individual_info set indinfo_caste=?,indinfo_religion=?,indinfo_resident_status=?,indinfo_resident_country=?,indinfo_is_staff=?, indinfo_staff_id=?,indinfo_is_minor=?,indinfo_edu_qual=?,indinfo_spouse_name=?,indinfo_spouse_occupation=?, indinfo_spouse_qualification=?,indinfo_spouse_address=?,indinfo_guardian_name=?,indinfo_guardian_relation=?,indinfo_guardian_address=? where indinfo_appid=?

select p.perapp_id,p.perapp_cbsid,f.FACILITY_EXISTING,f.FACILITY_MONTHS,f.FACILITY_SANCAMT,f.BPLR as loan_modintrate,f.FACILITY_PERINSTALL,f.FACILITY_HOLIDAYPERIOD,f.FACILITY_INTTYPE ,fc.COM_FACILITY_EMISCHEME as scheme_code,to_char(a.APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate,c.COM_SACTIONLEVEL,c.COM_SANCAUTHORITY,f.FACILITY_CODE,f.FACILITY_REPAYTYPE ,to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ac_opening_date,p.perapp_constitution, a.app_renew_flag,c.COM_SANCDEPT,fc.COM_BANKSCHEME,f.FACILITY_MODEOFREPAY,f.FACILITY_OPERATIONACCNO,fc.COM_FACILITY_INTFREQ ,a.APP_VALUESIN,f.facility_repaytype,fc.com_schemeheadcode,f.facility_renew_flag,c.com_partyfileno,f.facility_sancinterest,fc.com_facility_loantype,f.facility_agrschemetype,f.facility_typefor ,facility_baserate,f.facility_interestcharged,f.facility_interestrec,f.facility_schemetype,to_char(facility_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as facility_duedate, (case when facility_facnature='2' then facility_fitl_acc else '' end) as facility_fitl_acc,facility_propbanktype,FACILITY_MODEOFREPAY,FACILITY_ECSBANKNAME,FACILITY_ECSACCOUNTTYPE,FACILITY_ECSIFSCCODE,FACILITY_ECSOPERACCNUM,FACILITY_ECSATHUNMODE from perapplicant p,applications a,facilities f,com_briefbackground c,FACILITY_CORP fc where p.perapp_id=f.BORROWER_ID and f.FACILITY_APPNO='^' and a.APP_NO=f.FACILITY_APPNO and f.FACILITY_SNO='^' and c.COM_APPNO=a.APP_NO and fc.COM_FACID=f.FACILITY_CODE
